channel.title: Project Vision 718/742 Vps hosted 24/7 All Skills trainable/Custom bosses/And mo
channel.description:
[CENTER]Project Vision 718 loading 742 cache [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kgSCOZW.png[/img] Project Vision is an server that has great staff which are always nice to players, like to help and have fun. New content every day, you can suggest some ideas by using an command ::suggest and i will check them out and add them if i think its a good idea :) This is the server that isnt made for money or anything like that. its made because i really enjoy coding and i want to have my own server. Now enough talking lets get into some of the pictures :) And we hope to see you ingame :D
[CENTER]Client Download:[url=http://download1506.mediafire.com/p889k76cu3og/7n44c2tn4khljqn/Client.jar]Client[/url] Forums: Still in progress (if there is any website developers we would gladly accept help.)[/CENTER] Here are some of the feature that our server has but this is not everything. There is alot more for you to check out so if you are interested hop on :)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SrXkrO0.png[/img]
[CENTER]Dungeoneering system,shop,Prestige sytem:[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RxSiHon.png[/img]
120 Master capes (require 200m experience in certain skill to be able to wear them),The reaper and the final boss title requirements,Boss and npc pets.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sUnlwMJ.png[/img]
Here are some pvm,slayer,pking teleports and new boss task assigment.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d0Yk3IS.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FsJ4A3C.png[/img]
3 Slayer masters that require different combat and slayer lvl to be able to take an task from them, grim reaper the boss task master, creating an ascension crossbow, teleports for bosses that drop ascension signets, boss that drops dragon crossbows,npcs for ascension keys.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bDis1hF.png[/img]
Some pictures of donator zone, donator boss (drops drygores), donator npcs (they drop donator only armour), donator capes, donator rings (normal donator ring gives 2x exp and extreme gives 4x exp, they also provide some good bonuses)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cQQEdSz.png[/img]
I wont show you any pictures of skilling since all skills work :)
Now pictures of bosses some of them i made by myself. [SPOILER=Bosses] [CENTER]Nex:[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WwsSrMs.jpg[/img]
Bandos: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lA4uBRB.jpg[/img]
Armadyl: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2H96ZYr.jpg[/img]
Zamorak: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2uCkkWX.jpg[/img]
Saradomin: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vTuTnvj.jpg[/img]
Corporeal beast: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kkMIqjj.jpg[/img]
King black dragon [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/McM0V3X.jpg[/img]
Queen black dragon: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/71gmmvC.jpg[/img]
Daganoth kings: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Wqa1gOJ.jpg[/img]
Warped gulega: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GZyizhp.jpg[/img]
Bandos avatar: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lsFTl8p.jpg[/img]
Chaos elemental: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/frIwxeW.jpg[/img]
Ulfric: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AdC1n6n.jpg[/img]
Blink: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/69SiSaj.jpg[/img]
Bork: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/20ja4BM.jpg[/img]
Yk lagor the thunderous [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6ja9k9I.jpg[/img]
World-Gorger-Shukarhazh [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RUQBZfk.jpg[/img]
Tokhaar-Jad [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xNknaGj.jpg[/img]
Giant Mole: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BotyHvZ.jpg[/img]
Kalphite queen: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p4jjess.jpg[/img]
Sea troll queen: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YMmH8Lk.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER]
Thank you for taking your time on checking this out and if you like it please come and hop on and see how you like it. :)[/CENTER]

item.description:
@pakoo wrote:

[CENTER]Project Vision 718 loading 742 cache

Project Vision is an server that has great staff which are always nice to players, like to help and have fun.
New content every day, you can suggest some ideas by using an command ::suggest and i will check them out and add them if i think its a good idea
This is the server that isnt made for money or anything like that. its made because i really enjoy coding and i want to have my own server.
Now enough talking lets get into some of the pictures And we hope to see you ingame

[CENTER]Client Download:Client
Forums: Still in progress (if there is any website developers we would gladly accept help.)[/CENTER]
Here are some of the feature that our server has but this is not everything. There is alot more for you to check out so if you are interested hop on

[CENTER]Dungeoneering system,shop,Prestige sytem:[/CENTER]

120 Master capes (require 200m experience in certain skill to be able to wear them),The reaper and the final boss title requirements,Boss and npc pets.

Here are some pvm,slayer,pking teleports and new boss task assigment.

3 Slayer masters that require different combat and slayer lvl to be able to take an task from them, grim reaper the boss task master, creating an ascension crossbow, teleports for bosses that drop ascension signets, boss that drops dragon crossbows,npcs for ascension keys.

Some pictures of donator zone, donator boss (drops drygores), donator npcs (they drop donator only armour), donator capes, donator rings (normal donator ring gives 2x exp and extreme gives 4x exp, they also provide some good bonuses)

I wont show you any pictures of skilling since all skills work

Now pictures of bosses some of them i made by myself.

Thank you for taking your time on checking this out and if you like it please come and hop on and see how you like it. :)[/CENTER]
